channel.title: RepRap Magazine
channel.description: The online magazine for the RepRap community.

item.title: RepRap Magazine Issue 1
item.description: The very first issue of RepRap Magazine. Interview with Adrian Bowyer, RepRap Slicers, Repetier 1: Communication, and much more.

item.title: RepRap Magazine Issue 2
item.description: The second issue of RepRap Magazine. Interview with Nophead, RepRap Electronics, Laser Works, and much more.

item.title: RepRap Magazine Issue 3
item.description: The third issue of RepRap Magazine. Interview with Nicholas Seward, Paste Extrusion, Hot-Ends, and much more.
